title: Lily-Rose Depp enjoys a cheat day as she picks up fast food during makeup free outing
text:
She's the model-actress of Johnny Depp, 56, and Vanessa Paradis, 46.

And Lily-Rose Depp proved it was all about balance on Monday, spotted picking up some fast food during a day off.

The 20-year-old beauty showcased her makeup free complexion during the outing in New York City.

Scroll down for video

Stunner: Lily-Rose Depp showcased her gorgeous makeup free complexion on Monday when she was spotted stepping out to pick up some fast food in New York City

Lily-Rose rocked a black long sleeved top that covered up her toned and fit physique.

She teamed the look with a pair of loose fitting comfortable grey track pants that sat low on her hips and were cuffed at the ankle.

The beauty completed her ensemble with $30 Adidas slides for the casual outing.

Casual: Lily-Rose rocked a black long sleeved top that covered up her toned and fit physique

No stress look: The Vogue model styled her brunette tresses up into a messy bun and was makeup free for the outing

Lily-Rose kept her accessories minimal to shades over her sweater and carried her items in a small backpack.

The Vogue model styled her brunette tresses up into a messy bun and was makeup free for the outing.

The American-French beauty's appearance comes after she previously opened up about her struggles with an eating disorder in her younger years.

Speaking to Elle France in late 2016, she said she was affected by critical comments on social media about her looks.

Opening up: The American-French beauty's appearance comes after she previously opened up about her struggles with an eating disorder in her younger years

Not easy: 'I was much younger, when I faced with anorexia, it was very difficult to deal with it. All who are familiar with this problem, know how difficult it is to return to a normal life'

'It hurts a lot and depresses me, because I have spent a lot of energy fighting the disease,' she said.

'I was much younger, when I faced with anorexia, it was very difficult to deal with it. All who are familiar with this problem, know how difficult it is to return to a normal life.'

'I have battled eating disorder for a long time, and am very proud of the results that I have achieved.'

Lily-Rose is the daughter of actor, Johnny Depp, and French singer/model, Vanessa Paradis.

The pair never married but dated between 1998 and 2012.

They are also parents to John Christopher Depp III, 17.
description: Lily-Rose Depp showcased her gorgeous makeup free complexion on Monday when she was spotted stepping out to pick up some fast food in New York City.
